2021-08-01.name: Jahy-sama wa Kujikenai!
2021-08-01.desc:
* Based on a comedy slice of life manga by Konbu Wakame.

The Great Jahy, the Dark Realm's second-in-command, cuts a frightening figure, feared and revered by all. But when a run-in with a magical girl results in the destruction of the precious mana crystal, the Dark Realm falls, transporting the newly puny and powerless Jahy to the human world! Unfortunately, plotting the revival of the Dark Realm from a cramped, crumbling one-room apartment is no easy feat when you have rent to pay and a job to keep!

Source: Square Enix

2021-08-01.name: Magia Record: Mahou Shoujo Madoka Magica Gaiden 2nd Season - Kakusei Zen`ya
2021-08-01.desc: * Based on a smartphone role-playing game.

2021-08-06.name: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie: World Heroes` Mission
2021-08-06.desc:
A mysterious organization dedicated to the destruction of people with Quirks has issued a threat and set bombs all over the world. Pro Heroes and those in Hero Internships scramble to find the bombs. Deku, Bakugou, and Endeavor encounter Rodi, a boy living in a mobile home in their designated area of Oseon, and end up working with him.

Source: ANN

2021-08-13.name: Eiga Oshiri Tantei: Sufure-tou no Himitsu

2021-08-18.name: Tonikaku Kawaii: SNS
2021-08-18.desc: * Based on a comedy romance shounen manga by Hata Kenjirou.

2021-08-27.name: Gekijouban Fate/Kaleid Liner Prisma Illya Licht: Namae no Nai Shoujo
Misaki no Mayoiga
2021-08-27.desc:
The story centers around a traditional Japanese house named "Mayoiga" (named after the Japanese folkloric concept of an abandoned yet well-kept home) from where one can see the sea and feel the touch of warmth and nostalgia. Here, a 17-year-old girl named Yui who is trying to find her place in the world begins a new life with people completely unrelated to her.

Source: ANN
